reviews.name: mark gregory
reviews.text:
It was a family run business and the family were fantastic.
No fighting for sunbeds around the pool.
Fantastic location.
Good breakfast.
It's basic but it's OK.

Thanks ðŸ˜Š

reviews.name: Eirik Hansen
reviews.text:
Very close to the centre of Tsilivi but up a small but steep hill so fairly peaceful.
Nice pool , snacks and drinks from the bar. Various different rooms some overlooking the pool.
Lovely owners.

reviews.name: Diane Walker
reviews.text: Fantastic service, lovely clean rooms and pool. Bed a bit hard for me but didn't spoil a wonderful holiday. Staff very friendly and helpful.
